title: People, productivity and change
creator_credit: Peter Bradford, James Carr, Basic Films and British Productivity Council
brief_description: An examination of the problems of change as seen by men and women on the shopfloor and their trade union representatives. When a company decides to make changes in its products, processes or procedures, the trade unions are inevitably involved; the pay, the status, even the jobs of their members may be at stake.
